tool.name: Import data from matrix
tool.description: Quality control and normalization of a matrix expression data

param.name: conditions
param.label: Conditions
param.help: conditions associated with the input file

tool.help:
**What it does** This tool imports data stored in a tabular text file. Column titles (chip IDs) must match the IDs of the .cond file. GPL annotation code is required to fetch annotations from GEO
**Results** - Bboxplots and MA plots - Rdata object containing the data for further analysis. -----
